operations.summary: Search all Countries with diverse filters (JSON or XML)

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your Joshua Project API key.

parameters.name: bible_complete
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum total number of Primary Languages (CntPrimaryLanguages) in the country that have a Bible Status of Complete Bible.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get a total matching that number.

parameters.name: bible_new_testament
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum total number of Primary Languages (CntPrimaryLanguages) in the country that have a Bible Status of New Testament.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get a total matching that number.

parameters.name: bible_portions
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum total number of Primary Languages (CntPrimaryLanguages) in the country that have a Bible Status of Portions.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get a total matching that number.

parameters.name: continents
parameters.description:
A bar separated list of one or more continents to filter by.Use the following codes:
  • AFR - Africa
  • ASI - Asia
  • AUS - Australia
  • EUR - Europe
  • NAR - North America
  • SOP - Oceania (South Pacific)
  • LAM - South America

parameters.name: cnt_primary_languages
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum total number of primary languages.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get countries with a total number of primary languages matching that number.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A bar separated list of one or more FIPS 10-4 Letter Country Codes to filter by. See https://goo.gl/yYWY4J.

parameters.name: jpscale
parameters.description: A bar separated list of one or more JPScale codes to filter by. Only accepts the following codes: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5. For more information check out https://joshuaproject.net/global_list/progress.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum results to return. (Defaults to 100)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to display  (Defaults to 1)

parameters.name: pc_buddhist
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Buddhist.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_christianity
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Christians.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_ethnic_religion
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Ethnic Religions.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_evangelical
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Evangelicals.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_hindu
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Hindus.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_islam
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Islam.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_non_religious
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Non-Religious.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_other_religion
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Other Religions.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_protestant
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Protestants.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: pc_unknown
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Unkown Religions.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: population
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum population.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Countries matching that number.

parameters.name: primary_languages
parameters.description: A bar seperated list of ISO 3 Letter Codes. For more information check out http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php.

parameters.name: primary_religions
parameters.description:
A bar separated list of one or more primary religions to filter by. Use the following numbers:
  • 1 - Christianity
  • 2 - Buddhism
  • 4 - Ethnic Religions
  • 5 - Hinduism
  • 6 - Islam
  • 7 - Non-Religious
  • 8 - Other/Small
  • 9 - Unknown

parameters.name: regions
parameters.description:
A bar separated list of one or more regions to filter by. Use the following numbers:
  • 1 - South Pacific
  • 2 - Southeast Asia
  • 3 - Northeast Asia
  • 4 - South Asia
  • 5 - Central Asia
  • 6 - Middle East and North Africa
  • 7 - East and Southern Africa
  • 8 - West and Central Africa
  • 9 - Eastern Europe and Eurasia
  • 10 - Western Europe
  • 11 - Central and South America
  • 12 - North America and Caribbean

parameters.name: translation_needed
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum total number of Primary Languages (CntPrimaryLanguages) in the country that have a Bible Status of Translation Needed.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get a total matching that number.

parameters.name: translation_started
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum total number of Primary Languages (CntPrimaryLanguages) in the country that have a Bible Status of Translation Started.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get a total matching that number.

parameters.name: translation_unspecified
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum total number of Primary Languages (CntPrimaryLanguages) in the country that have a Bible Status of Unspecified.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get a total matching that number.

parameters.name: window1040
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Countries in the 1040 Window. (y or n)

errorResponses.reason: Bad request.  Your request is malformed in some way.  Check your supplied parameters.
Unauthorized.  Your missing your API key, or it has been suspended.
Not found.  The requested route was not found.
Internal server error.  Please try again later.

operations.notes: Retrieve a list of Countries that match your filter settings.

apis.description: Find all Countries that match your filter criteria.

operations.summary: Retrieve the details of a specific Country (JSON or XML)

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your Joshua Project API key.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The 2 letter FIPS 10-4 Country Code for the Country you want to view. [View all Country Codes]

errorResponses.reason: Bad request.  Your request is malformed in some way.  Check your supplied parameters.
Unauthorized.  Your missing your API key, or it has been suspended.
Not found.  The requested route was not found.
Internal server error.  Please try again later.

operations.notes: Retrieve the details of a specific Country by supplying the country's 2 letter FIPS 10-4 Code (id).

apis.description: Retrieve the details of a specific Country.
